Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network

Package that provides a simple malleable light-weight node/link representation, instantiations of which can be derived from instantiations of the standard MEKON frames representation.

See: Description

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    NProcessor
    Interface whose implementations will perform certain required modifications on network-based instance representations.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    NClassifier
    Abstract base-class for extensions of NClassifier that operate on the intermediate network-based representation.
    NCrawler
    Abstract base-class for processers that visit each node and feature in a network instance representation in turn, via a depth-first traversal starting from the root-node.
    NDataFeature<V>
    Represents a data-valued feature in the network-based instance representation
    NDirectMatcher
    Provides an implementation of the reasoning mechanisms defined by IMatcher in which the matching is done directly on the intermediate node/link network-based representations of queries and instances.
    NEntity
    Represents an entity in the network-based instance representation
    NFeature<V>
    Represents a feature attached to a node in the network-based instance representation.
    NLink
    Represents a link in the network-based instance representation.
    NMatcher
    Abstract base-class for implementations of IMatcher that operate on the intermediate network-based representation.
    NNetwork
    Provides an intermediate network-based representation, which provides a more malleable alternative to the standard MEKON frames representation, for use by specific reasoner and matcher implementations.
    NNode
    Represents a node in the network-based instance representation.
    NNumber
    Represents a number-valued feature in the network-based instance representation
    NString
    Represents a string-valued feature in the network-based instance representation

Package uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.network Description

Package that provides a simple malleable light-weight node/link representation, instantiations of which can be derived from instantiations of the standard MEKON frames representation. Provides a suitable intermediate representation for specific implementations of the IReasoner and uk.ac.manchester.cs.mekon.store.motor.IMatcher interfaces.
